required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy Assessment of Intravitreal Injection of Conbercept in Patients With Polypoidal Choroidal Vasculopathy (PCV)
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy Assessment of Intravitreal Injection of Conbercept in Patients With Polypoidal Choroidal Vasculopathy (PCV)

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the efficacy of intravitreal injection of 0.5 mg conbercept in patients with polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy (PCV) and explore the optimal route of administration.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of Best Corrected Visual Acuity
primary_outcome.description: The investigators will use the ETARS Chart which is international standard to measure the vision ability of participants.Best corrected visual is the number of letters which the participants can read on the ETARS Chart ,all procedure should be done according to SOP.The BCVA of 12th week and 48th week will be compared with the base line（pre-treatment）.

secondary_outcome.description: To observe pre- and posttreatment changes in CRT on OCT
To observe pre-and posttreatment changes on OCT;

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume and Thickness of Retinal Pigment Epithelial Detachment (PED)
secondary_outcome.description: To observe pre- and posttreatment changes in volume and thickness of PED on OCT;

secondary_outcome.measure: Area and Regression of Polypoidal Lesion
secondary_outcome.description: To observe pre- and posttreatment changes in area and regression of polypoidal lesion on ICGA
To observe pre- and posttreatment changes in size of retinal hemorrhages on CFP
To observe pre- and posttreatment changes in area of BVN on ICGA
Refers to the average frequency of administration for both groups of subjects during the study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events (AEs) and reactions

secondary_outcome.description: Ophthalmic examination include corneal、vitreous body、anterior chamber、iris、retina、disc、Macular 、drusen、PED examination Investigator will check whether the parts above is normal. Measurement for summarizing the data : Number of patients with different conditions of each part.
Number of participants with abnormal symptoms or vital signs.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events as assessed by laboratory results
secondary_outcome.description: Laboratory results include Blood routine 、Blood biochemistry、Coagulation function 、Urine routine 、Urinary pregnancy .

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by other tests.
secondary_outcome.description: Other tests indicated that which is not contained in the study done by the participants .

arm_group.description: The eye of interest will first receive three consecutive intravitreal injections of 0.5 mg conbercept every 4 weeks, followed by every 12 weeks. If the subject meets the "additional medication criteria" in 12 weeks during treatment, additional injection can be given;

The eye of interest will first receive three consecutive intravitreal injections of 0.5 mg conbercept every 4 weeks, then the researcher will determine the next follow-up visit time/treatment interval based on results of each follow-up assessment as per the "treatment-extended dosing criteria". When the follow-up/treatment interval of the subject is extended to 12 weeks, additional safety follow-up visit can be arranged if any suspicious active lesion is deemed by the researcher; additional injection can be given if the result of safety follow-up assessment meets the "extra dosing criteria".
